Name: String
Description: String

Name: NO_SPAWNTIMER
Description: Equivalent to ModifySpawnTimer, back compatibility tag, it will be removed

Name: NO_CHECKCOLLISIONS
Description: Disable MoveComponent check collisions

Name: NO_CHECKAVOIDANCE
Description: Disable MoveComponent check avoidance

Name: NO_BUFFS
Description: New buffs are ignored

Name: NO_PUSHED_BY_ENEMY
Description: Unit is not pushed by enemies (only walking ground units)

Name: NO_SHADOW
Description: If the tag is active the character will not have a shadow (temp tag?)

Name: STOP_FREEZE
Description: If the tag is active Global Freeze is disabled (event December 2023)

Name: INACTIVE
Description: Character is not activated and will not attack, (eg king tower)

Name: ACTIVATING
Description: Character is in process of activating, will not yet attack but will play activation animation

Name: HAS_SHIELD
Description: Character has all or some shield hitpoints left

Name: TAKING_DAMAGE
Description: Character did take damage in the previous tick

Name: HIDDEN
Description: Character is hidden
Note: Functional, but not used in all cases. Implemented when character is captured by evo cards

Name: ABILITY_DISABLED
Description: Executing champion ability is completely disabled and the button is greyed out.
Note: Functional, but not used in all cases. Implemented when character is captured by evo cards

Name: BUILDING_DEATH_SPAWN_FIND_LOCATION
Description: If this character has a death spawn, it will need to find a location for itself. Used for better positioning

Name: ABILITY_ACTIVATION
Description: Play ability activation animation

Name: ABILITY_READY
Description: Play ability ready animation

Name: ABILITY_POSTPONED
Description: Executing champion ability is currently postponed until the tag is no longer set.

Name: UNIT_CUSTOM_TAG_1
Description: Used for very specific and contained cases
Note: In use by only 1 evo. Should be replaced by blackboard eventually.

Name: NO_SUMMON
Description: Character can not summon others (does not affect death spawns)
